definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cover over, roof, Aram. loan-word, v. [[חלל]] (t.alel cover over, esp. put on roof, tat.liyl roof, ste/gh: so Palm. v. Eut:SBAk, 1885, 669)—only

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וִיטַלֲלֶנּוּ]] Ne 3:15 he built it (kept on building it, i.e. a city-gate) and covered it over (laid timbers to cover it, cf. [[קֵרוּהוּ]] they laid its timbers v:Ne 3:3, v:Ne 3:6; v. also [[בְּחֵל קׂרָתִי]] Ge 19:8 in the shadow of my roof).
